channel.title: Svn on Joachim Wiberg
channel.description: Recent content in Svn on Joachim Wiberg

item.title: Learning About GIT
item.description: It has been a long time coming, but now I’m seriously starting to look at Git. Git is the content tracker used by the Linux kernel folks, initially developed by Torvalds. At Westermo R&D we use Subversion for our daily operations and today I started migrating the software to Git. Mainly just to get a comparison of performance, storage size and to explore how we can use Git on top of svn to become more productive when working in parallel in different teams.
